net.explorviz.landscape.repository.persistence

Interface LandscapeRepository<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MongoLandscapeJsonApiRepository, MongoLandscapeRepository

    public interface LandscapeRepository<T>
    Represents a repository to store Landscape objects persistently.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void cleanup()
      Removes all landscapes that have exceeded their life span.
      void cleanup(long from)
      Removes all landscapes that have exceeded their lifespan.
      void clear()
      Removes all landscapes in the repository.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getAllTimestamps()
      Retrieves all timestamps currently stored in the db.
      T getById(long id)
      Retrieves a landscape object with a specific, unique identifier.
      T getByTimestamp(long timestamp)
      Retrieves a landscape object with a specific timestamp from the repository.
      int getTotalRequests(long timestamp)
      Retrieves the total requests of a landscape.
      void save(java.lang.Long timestamp, net.explorviz.shared.landscape.model.landscape.Landscape landscape, int totalRequests)
      Saves a Landscape object in the repository.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        void save(java.lang.Long timestamp,
          net.explorviz.shared.landscape.model.landscape.Landscape landscape,
          int totalRequests)
        Saves a Landscape object in the repository.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the timestamp, associated to this landscape. Will be used to index the objects.
        landscape - the landscape object.
        totalRequests - the total amount of requests

      • getByTimestamp

        T getByTimestamp(long timestamp)
        Retrieves a landscape object with a specific timestamp from the repository.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the timestamp of the landscape object
        Returns:
        the landscape object
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.ClientErrorException - if the landscape could not be found.

      • getAllTimestamps

        java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getAllTimestamps()
        Retrieves all timestamps currently stored in the db. Each timestamp is a unique identifier of an object.
        Returns:
        list of all timestamps

      • getById

        T getById(long id)
        Retrieves a landscape object with a specific, unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the landscape object
        Returns:
        the landscape object
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.ClientErrorException - if the landscape could not be found.

      • getTotalRequests

        int getTotalRequests(long timestamp)
        Retrieves the total requests of a landscape.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the timestamp of the landscape
        Returns:
        the total requests

      • cleanup

        void cleanup(long from)
        Removes all landscapes that have exceeded their lifespan.
        Parameters:
        from - the reference timestamp to use for lifetime calculation.

      • cleanup

        default void cleanup()
        Removes all landscapes that have exceeded their life span. Equivalent to cleanup(System.currentTimeMillis())

      • clear

        void clear()
        Removes all landscapes in the repository.
